title: Playkidiz Magic Scratch Art for Kids - 100 Black Scratch Sheets With 2 Stylus Tools - Craft Kits For Kids Create Colourful Rainbow Cards, Pictures & Other Art Without Ink - Arts And Crafts For Kids
features: MAGICAL SCRATCH OFF ART SET Cool Black Paper Etches Away to Reveal Bright, Colourful, Rainbow Designs; Unique Supplies for Home, School, Office, Etc.
100 SHEETS FOR ENDLESS PLAY Bulk Pack Features a Mini Size Note Pad w/ Plenty of Individual Pages; Fun Way to Doodle, Leave Notes, Write Lists or Ask for Favours
INCLUDES 2 STYLUS STICKS All-in-One Kit Arrives w/ [2] Perfectly Sized Wooden Pens So Multiple Kids Can Scratch Away; Grab a Couple Packs for the Entire Class
AMAZING ARTS AND CRAFTS GIFT Boys & Girls of All Ages Love Exercising Their Imaginations w/ Fun Scratchboard Art; Give an Unforgettable Birthday Present
description: Product Description Create colourful sketches and sayings from scratch! Looking for an easy way to entertain kids for hours? From curious kindergarten students to artsy teens to bored adults, everyone is spellbound by the colourful enchantment of Scratch Off Magic Art by Playkidz Art. This awesomely unique kit arrives with 100 scratchy notes and 2 stylus toolsa simple formula for embarking on a magical arts and crafts journey. Each piece of black paper has a hidden layer of rainbow colour. Press gently with the wooden stylus to scratch away the matte coating, and see your thoughts and drawings appear in bright, vibrant shades of the colour spectrum. Kids can sketch shapes, images, letters and numbers, while older folks put an exciting twist on their tired notes and grocery lists. With this truly extreme notebook, there are so many ideas for creation. So put away the messy pens, pencils, markers and paints and add the Scratch Off Magic Art Kit to your cart today! What You Get100 x Sheets of Scratch of Maguc Art Notes 2 x Stylus tools to get you scratching A desktop box to keep everything neat and tidy Stress-free supplies for your arts and crafts classroom! Specs & Details Box quantity: 100 Note Sheets Stylus quantity: 2 Safe & non-toxic Recommended ages: 4 and up How to Enjoy Grab a black sheet and prepare to scratch away Press gently and drag the stylus to reveal the rainbow colour Experiment with pictures, figures, numbers, letters and more Watch kids draw a unicorn, dinosaur, jellyfish the sky's the limit! Safety Warning Recommended ages: 4 and upHow to EnjoyGrab a black sheet and prepare to scratch away
